title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-9.9 - Post-institutional control requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 383-9.9 - Post-institutional control requirements

State Regulations

After the institutional control period, the custodial
agency must carry out a program of periodic site surveillance and environmental
monitoring. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
383-9.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
